publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3175 Margaret Mitchell: Orbiston Neighbourhood Centre—That the Parliament congratulates the Orbiston Neighbourhood Centre on its 10th anniversary; commends the excellent work of the centre, which provides a wide range of activities for local people along with extensive opportunities for volunteers, and wishes the centre many more years of success in achieving its aim of being a meeting place where people from many different backgrounds and age groups can come together, learn from one another and come to enjoy each other’s company. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3175 Orbiston Neighbourhood Centre (lodged on 22 August 2005) Linda Fabiani*
